job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description: Our Client, a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstanding phone/communication skills to work as part of their new digital support team that will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues. You will troubleshoot Level 1 over the phone and occasionally in person as part of a 24x7 call center. There could be some local travel. You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug test.  Must haves:Great Customer ServiceLevel 1 tech skillsWants to grow in techAble to remotely troubleshoot issuesPossible travel up to 25% so  must have a vehicleRemote and NationwideWindows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshootingFamiliarity with help desk ticketing systemsFamiliarity with Active Directory and VPN big +Network printer installation and configurationNetwork printer installation and configuration
